content: this is a summary of a court appeal in antwerp regarding a legal case that has been ongoing for 4 years and 6 months the appeal is related to the costs of the proceedings specifically the costs incurred by the respondent who lost the case the text outlines the steps involved in a legal case including the filing of a complaint serving the defendant with a copy of the complaint the defendants response the discovery phase attempts at negotiation or mediation the trial the verdict and the option to appeal the text does not provide information on the final outcome of the case or any further steps that may have been taken
